item.title: Timeline Plugin
item.description: From the Timeline Plugin Github Repo: Build Amazing Timelines We recommend you use the snippet instead for footnotes and node links and use it with other plugins.
Finish making notes from 2025-06-04 After watching the video on Mentats from yesterday, I was recommended this video on memory and “how to think like a Mentat”.

item.title: Nix User Repository (NUR)
item.description: The Nix User Repository is a registry of Nix community repos. Website: nur.nix-community.org/ Github: github.com/nix-community/NUR.

item.title: Vignette vs Compose
item.description: This PKMashup prompted some thoughts about WIP projects Compose RPG and Vignette RPG and the false dichotomy of Top Down and Bottom Up design.

item.title: index
item.description: The Metamageia Vault Welcome! My name is Gage Lara aka Metamageia.

item.title: Cognitive Assessment
item.description: Full Scale IQ (FSIQ): Comprehensive Adult Intelligence Test (CAIT) Fluid Intelligence: Jouve-Cerebrals Test of Induction (JCTI) .

item.title: Comprehensive Adult Intelligence Test (CAIT)
item.description: The aim of project CAIT is to provide a free resource for estimating a Full Scale IQ (FSIQ) score for adults interested in Cognitive Assessment.

item.title: Jouve-Cerebrals Test of Induction (JCTI)
item.description: The Jouve-Cerebrals Test of Induction (JCTI) is a computerized adaptive Cognitive Assessment designed to assess Inductive Reasoning.

item.title: Arguments
item.description: “A reason or set of reasons given with the aim of persuading others that an action or idea is right or wrong.” New Oxford American Dictionary In Analytical Reading, the key sentences in individual paragraphs in a well constructed book will form the basis of an author’s arguments.

item.title: Rating of Perceived Exertion
item.description: Rating of Perceived Exertion (RPE) is a subjective quantification of how hard somebody feels they are working while exercising.
